search.name: My Yahoo!
search.description:
Login to My Yahoo
Example:
yy
yy myid
yy myotherid
Variables:
yyid('user','pwd');An array storing a user and password profile for Yahoo! You SHOULD provide the yyid() variable, however, you may also provide as many other profiles as necessary to account for your Yahoo ID's. If you were to create a 'second' profile you would need only to pass the variable name on the command line:
yy otherVariable
These variables are, however, case sensitive. If the variable passed does not exist (misspelled, incorrect case...), this search will 'default' to using the yyid variable.
